actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to permit the holding of Federal District Court for the Eastern District of New York at a suitable site in Nassau County in lieu of Mineola.

summary.text: Permits the holding of Federal District Court for the Eastern District of New York at a new site in Nassau County in lieu of Mineola. (Amends 28 U.S.C. 112(d))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to permit the holding of Federal District Court for the Eastern District of New York at a suitable site in Nassau County in lieu of Mineola.
